content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **grain** - by tin can knits ============ -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **the grain shawl pattern is now available in the free tin can knits app ** click here to download the app or to learn more 1 only see the size instructions you need tick through the pattern and make notes support is just a tap away adjust the settings to suit you *learn to knit with alexa and emily the grain shawl is part of the simple collection 2 - a learn to knit series with excellent free patterns and clear tutorials from your first scarf to mittens socks and sweaters learn all you need to know to make modern seamless knits for all of your loved ones * -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **like our knits ** get our email updates 3 to hear about new designs tutorials and subscriber-only special offers -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** **sizing** finished shawl measures approximately 63 across and 23 deep **yarn** 600 yards worsted / aran weight yarn 700 yards dk weight yarn 800 yards sock / fingering weight yarn * sample was shown in sweet fiber cashmere aran 1 skein of moonstone 1 skein of chartreuse 2 skeins each of smoke and olive * **needles** worsted us #9 / 5 5mm 32 circular needle dk us #7 / 4 5mm 32 circular needle fingering us #4 / 3 5mm 32 circular needle * or as required to meet gauge * **gauge** in worsted dk fingering 14 20 24 sts and 36 40 52 row / 4 in garter stitch **notions** stitch markers darning needle **helpful tutorials** let s knit a simple shawl 4 how to work a garter tab cast on 5 --------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 6 --------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------- 1 https //tincanknits com/app 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/the-simple-collection 3 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 4 http //blog tincanknits com/2016/12/22/lets-knit-a-simple-shawl/ 5 https //blog tincanknits com/2009/08/02/garter-tab-cast-on/ 6 http //www tincanknits com
